sn_aia_usecase.base_plan: Step 1: Remove and scrub any PII data that the user has included in their incident description. Step 2: Make recommendations for surviving and escaping Las Vegas.
sn_aia_usecase.description: Help users trying to survive Las Vegas by cleansing the PII in their incident, reviewing the incident, and making recommendations for leaving Las Vegas.
sn_aia_usecase.name: SNAI Vegas Survival Helper
